name: 动作场景
description: 用于动作和运动镜头的模板

variables.name: action_primary
variables.example: walking forward slowly, taking measured steps

variables.name: action_secondary
variables.example: right hand brushing hair behind ear, soft smile forming

variables.name: environment
variables.example: school rooftop with chain-link fence, city skyline in background

variables.name: camera_movement
variables.example: slow pan right following character, smooth tracking shot

variations: full shot: entire body visible, show movement clearly
tracking shot: camera follows character smoothly
dynamic angles: low angle for power, high angle for vulnerability
motion blur: slight blur for speed sense

quality_modifiers.STANDARD: , fluid motion, highly detailed, 4k, smooth animation
quality_modifiers.HIGH: , fluid motion, ultra realistic, 8k, smooth animation, professional cinematography
quality_modifiers.PREMIUM: , masterpiece, fluid motion, ultra detailed, 8k uhd, smooth animation, professional cinematography, motion capture quality

lighting_presets.dynamic: dynamic lighting with moving shadows, high contrast
lighting_presets.dramatic: dramatic lighting emphasizing movement, strong directional light

negative_prompt: static, boring, low quality, unrealistic motion, choppy animation, frozen pose, stiff movement, unnatural physics
usage_notes: 此模板专注于动作流畅性和运动表现。确保动作描述清晰，包含起始和结束状态以保持连续性。使用 tracking shot 跟随角色运动。
